description:
8.105 sidechaincompress
This filter acts like normal compressor but has the ability to compress
detected signal using second input signal.
It needs two input streams and returns one output stream.
First input stream will be processed depending on second stream signal.
The filtered signal then can be filtered with other filters in later stages of
processing. See pan and amerge filter.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: sidechaincompress

options.description: Set input gain. Default is 1. Range is between 0.015625 and 64.
options.name: level_in

options.description: Set mode of compressor operation. Can be upward or downward. Default is downward.
options.name: mode

options.description: If a signal of second stream raises above this level it will affect the gain reduction of first stream. By default is 0.125. Range is between 0.00097563 and 1.
options.name: threshold

options.description: Set a ratio about which the signal is reduced. 1:2 means that if the level raised 4dB above the threshold, it will be only 2dB above after the reduction. Default is 2. Range is between 1 and 20.
options.name: ratio

options.description: Amount of milliseconds the signal has to rise above the threshold before gain reduction starts. Default is 20. Range is between 0.01 and 2000.
options.name: attack

options.description: Amount of milliseconds the signal has to fall below the threshold before reduction is decreased again. Default is 250. Range is between 0.01 and 9000.
options.name: release

options.description: Set the amount by how much signal will be amplified after processing. Default is 1. Range is from 1 to 64.
options.name: makeup

options.description: Curve the sharp knee around the threshold to enter gain reduction more softly. Default is 2.82843. Range is between 1 and 8.
options.name: knee

options.description: Choose if the average level between all channels of side-chain stream or the louder(maximum) channel of side-chain stream affects the reduction. Default is average.
options.name: link

options.description: Should the exact signal be taken in case of peak or an RMS one in case of rms. Default is rms which is mainly smoother.
options.name: detection

options.description: Set sidechain gain. Default is 1. Range is between 0.015625 and 64.
options.name: level_sc

options.description: How much to use compressed signal in output. Default is 1. Range is between 0 and 1.
options.name: mix
